text: Josef Manner & Comp AG is an Austrian company that is known for its sweets. It is the biggest Austrian producer of sweets. Today, they are present in over 60 countries. They are best known for their wafers filled with chocolate-hazelnut cream (called Manner-schnitten). Its headquarters are in Vienna. Category:Food companies of Europe category:Vienna Category:Companies of Austria
title: Josef Manner & Comp AG
